@app.test_connectivity()
def test_connectivity(soar: SOARClient, asset: Asset) -> None:
    raise NotImplementedError()

@app.action(description='Send a message', action_type='test', read_only=False, verbose='This is a test action')
def send_message(params: Params, soar: SOARClient, asset: Asset) -> ActionOutput:
    raise NotImplementedError()
